ru: Носок поднятой ноги вытяните от себя.
Прижмите переднюю часть бедра к поверхности.

en: Place a block under your hands.
enSynonyms: Position a block beneath your hands.
Set a block under your palms.
Put a block below your hands.
Arrange a block underneath your hands.
Place a yoga block under your hands for support.

en: Reach upwards through the crown of your head.

ru: Согните вытянутую ногу и противоположной кистью возьмитесь за подъем стопы.
en: Bend your extended leg, then reach with the opposite hand to take hold of the top of your foot.
Slide your extended leg’s knee back.

ru: Пятку тяните к ягодице, а носок - к пояснице.
Отведенный назад плечевой сустав подайте вперед.

enSynonyms: Open the chest wide.
Expand your chest.
Broaden the chest area.
Lift and open the chest.
Open up the chest wide.
Stretch the chest open.
Lift your chest, widening it.
Open the chest to its full width.
Widen the rib cage.
Broaden your chest as you breathe deeply.
Expand your ribcage and open the chest.
Widen the space across your chest.
Open up your chest area.
Stretch your chest wide.
Release and open the chest.
Lift and expand the chest.

ru: Передняя часть бедра вытянутой ноги расслаблена.

en: Direct your attention to the point of stretch.
enSynonyms: Focus your awareness on the area where you feel the stretch.
Bring your attention to the point of tension and elongation.
Shift your focus to the spot where the stretch is most noticeable.
Guide your awareness to the sensation of the stretch.
Concentrate on the area of your body experiencing the stretch.
Direct your focus to the region where you feel the pull.
Place your attention on the part of your body being stretched.
Tune in to the point of tension and stretching.
Bring your focus to the specific area where the stretch is felt.
Concentrate your awareness on the point of elongation.
